# Check BGC data

**Purpose:** Code to check BP data for errors

**Author:** Perry ([sarah.perry\@water.ca.gov](mailto:sarah.perry@water.ca.gov){.email})

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(vegan)
library(lubridate)
source('admin/global_functions/global_funcs.R')
source('admin/global_functions/check_funcs.R')
```

```{r}
df_phyto <- read_quiet_csv(abs_pesp_path('Groups/USGS-BGC/02 Processed Data/BGC_draft.csv')) %>%
  mutate(Year = as.factor(year(Date)),
         Binary = 1,
         Event = paste(Date, site_abbrev, sep = '_')) %>%
  rename('Station' = 'site_abbrev') %>%
  mutate(SampleMethod = 
           case_when(
             SampleMethod == 'Diaphragm pump and churn' ~ 'Diaphragm pump',
             TRUE ~ SampleMethod
           )
         )

# format df (genus unit)
df_genus <- df_phyto %>%
  group_by(Date, Year, Station, Genus, SampleMethod, Event) %>%
  summarize(Biovolume_per_mL = sum(Biovolume_per_mL),
            Cells_per_mL = sum(Cells_per_mL),
            .groups = 'drop') %>%
  mutate(Binary = 1)
```

# NMDS by Species

### Biovol
```{r}
# create NMDS
df_nmds_bv <- calc_nmds(df_phyto,
                      group_var = 'Event',
                      factor_var = c('Year','SampleMethod'),
                      nmds_var = 'Biovolume_per_mL')

# print plot
plt_nmds <- plot_nmds(df_nmds_bv$df_nmds, df_nmds_bv$meta_vars, fill_var = 'Year')
plt_nmds

ggsave(
  filename = abs_pesp_path('Groups/USGS-BGC/02 Processed Data/QC files/graphs/BGC_NMDS_Species_Biovolume_Year.jpg'),
  plot = plt_nmds,
  width = 8,
  height = 6
)

# print plot
plt_nmds <- plot_nmds(df_nmds_bv$df_nmds, df_nmds_bv$meta_vars, fill_var = 'SampleMethod')
plt_nmds

ggsave(
  filename = abs_pesp_path('Groups/USGS-BGC/02 Processed Data/QC files/graphs/BGC_NMDS_Species_Biovolume_SampleMethod.jpg'),
  plot = plt_nmds,
  width = 8,
  height = 6
)
```

# Check Counts
```{r}
plt_count <- check_station_count(df_phyto)

plt_count

ggsave(
  filename = abs_pesp_path('Groups/USGS-BGC/02 Processed Data/QC files/graphs/BGC_Heatmap_StationNumber.jpg'),
  plot = plt_count,
  width = 8,
  height = 5
)
```

```{r}
df_phyto <- df_phyto %>%
  rename('Station2' = 'Station',
         'Station' = 'site_no')

plt_freq <- check_sampling_freq(df_phyto)

plt_freq

ggsave(
  filename = abs_pesp_path('Groups/USGS-BGC/02 Processed Data/QC files/graphs/BGC_Heatmap_SampFreq.jpg'),
  plot = plt_freq,
```
